recipes.title: Candy Cane Chip Ice Cream // Zoku Giveaway

winePairing.pairingText: Port, Moscato d'Asti, and Cream Sherry are great choices for Frozen Dessert. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The Barrel Reserve Port with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 19 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Barrel Reserve Port
productMatches.description: It has a complex richness defined by chocolate and black cherry flavors and aromas, and lengthy oak aging that add spice, vanilla and bold tannins. This velvet smooth port can be enjoyed as a stand-alone dessert or can be perfectly paired with chocolate delights. Serve at 65 degrees F.

recipes.instructions: Combine milk, cream, vanilla, sugar, peppermint syrup, and salt in a medium bowl.  Whisk until well combined.Chill in the fridge for 30 minutes.Meanwhile, chop/crush your candy cane and grate your chocolate.In a prepared Zoku Ice Cream Maker pour 1/2 cup of the chilled cream mixture and stir, scrape for about 7 minutes.  It will start freezing before your eyes.Add in about a tbsp of each the crushed candy cane and grated chocolate.  Continue to stir for another 3 minutes.Either serve immediately or transfer to a freezer container and freeze.Continue process for remaining 5 servings.

steps.step: Combine milk, cream, vanilla, sugar, peppermint syrup, and salt in a medium bowl.

Whisk until well combined.Chill in the fridge for 30 minutes.Meanwhile, chop/crush your candy cane and grate your chocolate.In a prepared Zoku Ice Cream Maker pour 1/2 cup of the chilled cream mixture and stir, scrape for about 7 minutes.  It will start freezing before your eyes.

Add in about a tbsp of each the crushed candy cane and grated chocolate.  Continue to stir for another 3 minutes.Either serve immediately or transfer to a freezer container and freeze.Continue process for remaining 5 servings.
